result.eng: You will have to talk to her again.
result.ga: Beidh ort labhairt léi arís
result.orig: Beidh ort labhairt léi arís
result.html: Beidh ort labhairt léi arísYou will have to talk to her again.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ ort laḃairt léi arísYou will have to talk to her again.

result.eng: I met her in the street.
result.ga: Bhuail mé léi ar an tsráid
result.orig: Bhuail mé léi ar an tsráid
result.html: Bhuail mé léi ar an tsráidI met her in the street.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail mé léi ar an tsráidI met her in the street.

result.eng: I help her from time to time.
result.ga: Bím ag cuidiú léi ó am go ham
result.orig: Bím ag cuidiú léi ó am go ham
result.html: Bím ag cuidiú léi ó am go hamI help her from time to time.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag cuidiú léi ó am go hamI help her from time to time.

result.eng: She prepared breakfast as she usually did.
result.ga: D'ullmhaigh sí bricfeasta mar ba ghnáth léi
result.orig: D'ullmhaigh sí bricfeasta mar ba ghnáth léi
result.html: D'ullmhaigh sí bricfeasta mar ba ghnáth léiShe prepared breakfast as she usually did.
result.ponchtml: D'ullṁaiġ sí bricfeasta mar ba ġnáṫ léiShe prepared breakfast as she usually did.

result.eng: I told her to leave.
result.ga: Dúirt mé léi imeacht
result.orig: Dúirt mé léi imeacht
result.html: Dúirt mé léi imeachtI told her to leave.
result.ponchtml: Dúirt mé léi imeaċtI told her to leave.

result.eng: She will accept anything you tell her.
result.ga: Glacfaidh sí le rud ar bith a deir tú léi
result.orig: Glacfaidh sí le rud ar bith a deir tú léi
result.html: Glacfaidh sí le rud ar bith a deir tú léiShe will accept anything you tell her.
result.ponchtml: Glacfaiḋ sí le rud ar biṫ a deir tú léiShe will accept anything you tell her.

result.eng: She kept on complaining until she got an answer.
result.ga: Lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagra
result.orig: Lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagra
result.html: Lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagraShe kept on complaining until she got an answer.
result.ponchtml: Lean sí ag gearán léi go ḃfuair sí freagraShe kept on complaining until she got an answer.

result.eng: When you see her, tell her.
result.ga: Nuair a fheicfidh tú í abair léi
result.orig: Nuair a fheicfidh tú í abair léi
result.html: Nuair a fheicfidh tú í abair léiWhen you see her, tell her.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ḟeicfiḋ tú í abair léiWhen you see her, tell her.

result.eng: I haven't spoken to her since we left school.
result.ga: Níor labhair mé léi ó d'fhág muid an scoil
result.orig: Níor labhair mé léi ó d'fhág muid an scoil
result.html: Níor labhair mé léi ó d'fhág muid an scoilI haven't spoken to her since we left school.
result.ponchtml: Níor laḃair mé léi ó d'ḟág muid an scoilI haven't spoken to her since we left school.

result.eng: I congratulated her on her birthday.
result.ga: Rinne mé comhghairdeas léi ar a breithlá
result.orig: Rinne mé comhghairdeas léi ar a breithlá
result.html: Rinne mé comhghairdeas léi ar a breithláI congratulated her on her birthday.
result.ponchtml: Rinne mé coṁġairdeas léi ar a breiṫláI congratulated her on her birthday.

result.eng: Do you get on well with her?
result.ga: An réitíonn tú go maith léi
result.orig: An réitíonn tú go maith léi
result.html: An réitíonn tú go maith léiDo you get on well with her?
result.ponchtml: An réitíonn tú go maiṫ léiDo you get on well with her?

result.eng: I get on well with her, for the most part.
result.ga: Réitím go maith léi den chuid is mó
result.orig: Réitím go maith léi den chuid is mó
result.html: Réitím go maith léi den chuid is móI get on well with her, for the most part.
result.ponchtml: Réitím go maiṫ léi den ċuid is móI get on well with her, for the most part.

result.eng: Is she going on her own?
result.ga: An léi féin atá sí ag dul
result.orig: An léi féin atá sí ag dul
result.html: An léi féin atá sí ag dulIs she going on her own?
result.ponchtml: An léi féin atá sí ag dulIs she going on her own?

result.eng: Do you meet her much now?
result.ga: An gcasann sibh léi mórán anois
result.orig: An gcasann sibh léi mórán anois
result.html: An gcasann sibh léi mórán anoisDo you meet her much now?
result.ponchtml: An gcasann siḃ léi mórán anoisDo you meet her much now?

result.eng: She didn't like the look of us.
result.ga: Níor thaitin ár ndreach léi
result.orig: Níor thaitin ár ndreach léi
result.html: Níor thaitin ár ndreach léiShe didn't like the look of us.
result.ponchtml: Níor ṫaitin ár ndreaċ léiShe didn't like the look of us.

result.eng: During this employment no money was paid to herself.
result.ga: Le linn na fostaíochta seo níor íocadh aon airgead léi féin
result.orig: Le linn na fostaíochta seo níor íocadh aon airgead léi féin
result.html: Le linn na fostaíochta seo níor íocadh aon airgead léi féinDuring this employment no money was paid to herself.
result.ponchtml: Le linn na fostaíoċta seo níor íocaḋ aon airgead léi féinDuring this employment no money was paid to herself.

result.eng: She was told that she would have to pay €500 to the government.
result.ga: Dúradh léi go mbeadh uirthi €500 a íoc leis an rialtas
result.orig: Dúradh léi go mbeadh uirthi €500 a íoc leis an rialtas
result.html: Dúradh léi go mbeadh uirthi €500 a íoc leis an rialtasShe was told that she would have to pay €500 to the government.
result.ponchtml: Dúraḋ léi go mbeaḋ uirṫi €500 a íoc leis an rialtasShe was told that she would have to pay €500 to the government.

result.eng: He looked at the kid she was leading by the hand.
result.ga: D'amharc sé ar an tachrán ar ghreim láimhe léi
result.orig: D'amharc sé ar an tachrán ar ghreim láimhe léi
result.html: D'amharc sé ar an tachrán ar ghreim láimhe léiHe looked at the kid she was leading by the hand.
result.ponchtml: D'aṁarc sé ar an taċrán ar ġreim láiṁe léiHe looked at the kid she was leading by the hand.

result.eng: Wow, she's so small!
result.ga: Órú chomh beag léi
result.orig: Órú chomh beag léi
result.html: Órú chomh beag léiWow, she's so small!
result.ponchtml: Órú ċoṁ beag léiWow, she's so small!

result.eng: She could have laughed and that would be it.
result.ga: Thiocfadh léi gáire a dhéanamh agus sin a mbeadh de
result.orig: Thiocfadh léi gáire a dhéanamh agus sin a mbeadh de
result.html: Thiocfadh léi gáire a dhéanamh agus sin a mbeadh deShe could have laughed and that would be it.
result.ponchtml: Ṫiocfaḋ léi gáire a ḋéanaṁ agus sin a mbeaḋ deShe could have laughed and that would be it.

result.eng: We've been waiting for it a long time, this Home Rule.
result.ga: Is fada sinn ag feitheamh léi mar Home Rule
result.orig: Is fada sinn ag feitheamh léi mar Home Rule
result.html: Is fada sinn ag feitheamh léi mar Home RuleWe've been waiting for it a long time, this Home Rule.
result.ponchtml: Is fada sinn ag feiṫeaṁ léi mar Home RuleWe've been waiting for it a long time, this Home Rule.
